resources.string:
Hello, This is GallOrg, Gallery Organizer from scinix! 
 
With this, you can organize your Photos on Android gallery into Albums with meaningful name. Usage is simple. just click "Share" menu from gallery. 
(You can use "Share..." or "Send..." features from other applications like file manager.) 
 
Product Family: Orion for Danvi 
App Name: GallOrg 
 
Contact to Author: 
	 scinix@gmail.com 
	 http://sio4.tistory.com 
	 http://twitter.com/scinix

ChangeLogs: 
 * version 1.1.1 
	 - thumbnail on info popup. 
	 - now "Copy" works. 
 * version 1.1.0 
	 - add module "GallOrg Info" for EXIF view. 
	 - now scan media by default. 
 * version 1.0.2 
	 - auto-completion bug fix by disabling. 
	 - add special destination "back to the Camera". 
	 - add feature "empty album clean-up". 
	 - restrict to "image/*" and "video/*" for now. 
	 - now working with File Manager too. 
 * version 1.0.1 
	 - fix for losing file while move across filesystem.
...end in the end, \nthe love you take is equal to the love you make.
